# localName(forName:)

**Type Method**

Returns the local name from the specified qualified name.

## Declaration

```swift
class func localName(forName name: String) -> String
```

## Parameters

- **name**: A string that is a qualified name.

## Discussion

For example, if the qualified name is “bst:title”, this method returns “title”.

## Related Documentation

- **predefinedNamespace(forPrefix:)**: Returns an `NSXMLNode` object representing one of the predefined namespaces with the specified prefix.

## Managing Namespaces

- **localName**: Returns the local name of the receiver.
- **prefix**: Returns the prefix of the receiver’s name.
- **prefix(forName:)**: Returns the prefix from the specified qualified name.
